Plot

Michael Prithviraj Narayanan (Atharvaa) is a Pizza Delivery Boy, his mother is Mary (Devadarshini) and his bestfriends are Jagan (Jagan) and Christina (Raai Laxmi). Michael receives complaints from his boss (Manobala) for slow  pizza delivery, he follows every rule on riding the bike after a bike accident where he witnessed his father's death. Prithviraj falls in love with Samyuktha Aka Sam (Priya Anand), they become friends and she asks him to buy a bike,  and he agree's and they go on rides. one day Prithviraj and Sam get into an argument when he attempts to kiss her and she tells him that she only likes him as a friend. on there way home, Samyuktha is kidnapped by mysterious  bikers. Michael, Jagan and Christina look for clues to find the kidnappers. The Kidnapper is revealed to be Don Stoney (Johnny Tri Nguyen). Don Stoney is a biker who is fired after he beats a guy who scratches his bike. Stoney is  obsessed with his bike, Stoney's brother rides the bike competing Michael, Michael wins the bike, and Stoney's brother commit's suicide, Stoney attacked Michael's bike killing his father. Michael comes to Sam's rescue and Stoney's friend (Joe Mallori)organizes a bike race, and who wins get the bike. Michael wins the race, wins the bike and rescues Sam.
